alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 05 at 3:49PM MDT until August 05 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern El Paso County in east central Colorado... Northeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 348 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hanover, or 18 miles north of Pueblo Airport, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and hail up to two inches in diameter. Funnel clouds and tornadoes have been observed from this storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Pueblo Depot around 400 PM MDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
